body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park           Learn About the Park        Hālau o Kekuhi - Kumu Hula Kekuhi Kanahele NPS Photo        News View current and archived press releases. Subscribe to updates.   Photos & Multimedia View photo galleries. Stream or download videos including a vast library of "After Dark in the Park" presentations and "Nā Leo Manu - Heavenly Voices" performances.   History & Culture Learn the history and culture of the people and places of Hawai‘i's past. View historical collections.   Nature Learn about the animals and plants of the area as well as environmental factors.   Inventory & Monitoring The Inventory and Monitoring Program (I&M) is a major component of the National Park Service's strategy to improve park management through greater reliance on scientific information.    Education Hawai'i Volcanoes National Park offers a variety of educational programs to schools and educational institutions. Ranger-led, grade level curriculum-based programs for school groups visiting Hawaiʻi Volcanoes National Park focus on geology, forest ecology and Hawaiian culture.   Kids & Youth Activities for kids. Learn about the Junior Ranger program. View completed Junior Ranger Workbook posters.   Bookstore Hawai‘i Pacific Parks Association operates two Bookstores/Gift Shops in Hawai‘i Volcanoes National Park. One in Kīlauea Visitor Center and the other in Jaggar Museum.   Management Park planning, laws and policies, management documents.
title: Hawai'i Volcanoes National Park: Learn About the Park
